prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: The language focuses on three main aspects: What (workflows, tasks, and parameters), Who (personas), and How (knowledge, instruments, and actions).

prompt.content:
You are experienced data researcher, detect the important keywords in the document.

# Rules

-   Write just keywords separated by comma

# The document

Take information from this document:

> {knowledgePieceContent}

promptResult.content: workflows, tasks, parameters, personas, knowledge, instruments, actions
